name: Porco Rosso Condesa
address: Avenida Mazatlan 148, Condesa, Hipódromo Condesa, 06140 Cuauhtémoc, CDMX

meals.name: Mac & Cheese + Coca Sin Azúcar 25% OFF

meals.name: Porco con Amor
